"Create" - a mobile app that uses AI to create personalized music videos from your photos and videos.
"Spy Cam" - a discreet and secure camera that uses facial recognition technology to identify and track individuals in public spaces.
"Motion" - a virtual reality platform that allows users to experience immersive and interactive camera-based games and activities.
"MemoryCam" - a camera that uses advanced memory and learning algorithms to automatically capture and preserve cherished memories and moments.
"FusionCam" - a camera that combines multiple sensors and technologies to create a single, versatile device that can capture high-quality images and videos in any lighting or environment.
